explanation: [0-0] A man with a white towel on his head is holding a colorful xylophone in his right hand and a small yellow hammer in his left hand. He is looking down with his back to a white door and wall.

[0-5] The man turns his head to the right to glance at the xylophone, then turns back, his mouth closed. He picks up the small hammer with his left hand and strikes the xylophone once, then extends both hands downwards. The shot cuts to a lying man with a dinosaur bib around his neck and a khaki teddy bear beside him.
